slides.title: Welcome to DijiBill
slides.description: Your complete business management solution for invoicing, inventory, and sales tracking.

slides.title: Dashboard
slides.description: Get a comprehensive overview of your business with real-time analytics, sales summaries, and key performance indicators.

slides.title: Sales Invoices
slides.description: Create, manage, and track all your sales invoices. Generate professional invoices with ZATCA QR codes for compliance.

slides.title: Point of Sale (POS)
slides.description: Fast and intuitive point-of-sale system for quick transactions. Perfect for retail and restaurant operations.

slides.title: Customer Management
slides.description: Maintain detailed customer records, track purchase history, and build stronger customer relationships.

slides.title: Supplier Management
slides.description: Manage your supplier relationships, track purchase orders, and maintain vendor information efficiently.

slides.title: Product Management
slides.description: Organize your inventory with categories, track stock levels, and manage product pricing and details.

slides.title: Purchase Products
slides.description: Manage your purchasing workflow with dedicated product categories and supplier-specific pricing.

slides.title: Purchase Invoices
slides.description: Track all incoming invoices from suppliers, manage purchase orders, and maintain accurate financial records.

slides.title: Payment Management
slides.description: Track payments, manage different payment methods, and maintain comprehensive financial records.

slides.title: User Management
slides.description: Manage user accounts, set permissions, and control access to different parts of your business system.

slides.title: Administration
slides.description: Configure system settings, manage company information, and access advanced administrative features.

slides.title: You're All Set!
slides.description: You're now ready to start using DijiBill. Begin by setting up your company information and adding your first products or customers.
